title: Stadia promises a ‘great future’ and more games, in response to recent report
content:
Following a recent report of Google’s shift in focus away from the “consumer” side of Stadia, Google has promised gamers that a “great future” is still ahead for the streaming service.

more…

The post Stadia promises a ‘great future’ and more games, in response to recent report appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Following a recent report, Google Stadia has promised gamers that a "great future" is still ahead for the streaming service.
